title: feat(model): support Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite Preview model (02-05) in Google's model provider

body: # Summary Add Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite Preview model (02-05) to Google's model provider. * Original issue: #13246 * Related PRs for Gemini 2.0 models: * For Vertex.ai provider: #13266 * For Google model provider (without lite preview model): #13247 # Screenshots | Before | After | |--------|-------| | | | Model Selection Screenshot: # Checklist > [!IMPORTANT] > Please review the checklist below before submitting your pull request. - [ ] This change requires a documentation update, included: [Dify Document](https://github.com/langgenius/dify-docs) - [x] I understand that this PR may be closed in case there was no previous discussion or issues. (This doesn't apply to typos!) - [x] I've added a test for each change that was introduced, and I tried as much as possible to make a single atomic change. - [x] I've updated the documentation accordingly. - [x] I ran `dev/reformat`(backend) and `cd web && npx lint-staged`(frontend) to appease the lint gods
Please be aware that we are rolling out v1.0.0 which might not include this commit. Instead you should make changes to this repo as well https://github.com/langgenius/dify-official-plugins

> Please be aware that we are rolling out v1.0.0 which might not include this commit. Instead you should make changes to this repo as well https://github.com/langgenius/dify-official-plugins

@crazywoola 
Thanks for your comment.
I'll try adding gemini 2.0 models to https://github.com/langgenius/dify-official-plugins!

issue.title: Add Gemini 2.0 Flash and Pro Exp 02-05
issue.body:
### Self Checks

- [x] I have searched for existing issues [search for existing issues](https://github.com/langgenius/dify/issues), including closed ones.
- [x] I confirm that I am using English to submit this report (我已阅读并同意 [Language Policy](https://github.com/langgenius/dify/issues/1542)).
- [x] [FOR CHINESE USERS] 请务必使用英文提交 Issue，否则会被关闭。谢谢！:）
- [x] Please do not modify this template :) and fill in all the required fields.

### 1. Is this request related to a challenge you're experiencing? Tell me about your story.

Blog: https://blog.google/technology/google-deepmind/gemini-model-updates-february-2025/
Models: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/models/gemini
Pricing: https://ai.google.dev/pricing#2_0flash

### 2. Additional context or comments

_No response_

### 3. Can you help us with this feature?

- [ ] I am interested in contributing to this feature.

nodes.body:
> I can take this issue.

Thanks for your help! Let me know if you run into any issues or have any questions.
@laipz8200 @crazywoola I have created a PR for it, let me know if you want any more changes to it.
